name: SimpleCountdown
0:
”Alexa, launch simple countdown.”
”Alexa, open simple countdown.”
”Alexa, ask simple countdown to count down from 100.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple countdown
des:
You can use Simple Countdown to count down from a certain number.

After you launch the skill, Alexa will ask you to provide your number. Alexa will count down from your number.

To begin, say "Alexa, launch Simple Countdown."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
